entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SwiftErrorHandling: Assertion failed 'killMask == getKillSetForNode(tree)' #102349
  • [8.0] Various WASM hybrid globalization tests failing in many languages #102348
  • NI_AdvSimd_Store* use of gtNewSimdStoreNode() #102347
    9.0.0
  • Missing centos-stream9 runtime assets #102344
  • System.Runtime.Caching is not AOT compatible and isn't annotated #102341
  • Arm64: Rename AdvSimd/Sve Load/Store vector API names #102340
    9.0.0
  • JSImport returning Promise that signals reject #102339
  • Legacy code crashes in net 8.0 runtime #102338
  • win-arm64 tests failing with `Assert failure: (uImageBase == uImageBaseFromOS) && (memcmp(pFunctionEntry, pFunctionEntryFromOS, sizeof(RUNTIME_FUNCTION)) == 0)` #102337
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanScalarDestination_SpecialValues fails under jitstress on win-x86 #102335
    9.0.0
  • Runtime doesn't utilize available Ram and crashes #102332
    9.0.0
  • Feature Request: Add a dotnet root path property to the runtimeconfig.json file. #102329
  • Ability to filter thread pool thread events in a nettrace #102326
  • LockStatementWithLockVsMonitor failing in native AOT outerloop #102321
  • AccessViolationException in HttpClient.SendAsync() on macOS arm64 in .NET 9 preview.4 nightly builds #102313
    9.0.0
  • Runtime net8.0+ StackExchange.Redis.RedisTimeoutException error rate grows rapidly after upgrading StackExchange.Redis from .net 6 to 8.0 #102312
  • [Linux] DirectoryServices.Protocols does not connect to AD-Server #102310
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 5/13/2024 4:59:01 PM #102322
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions in BigInteger.Multiply #102319
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions #102320
  • Blazor WebAssembly: "An unhandled error has occurred. Reload" since .NET 8.0.5 #102307
  • Add SplitArchive support to ZipArchive #102306
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run HybridGlobalization MT tests #102305
  • IL2008: System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo: Could not resolve type 'System.SR'. #102303
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/0582/csgen.1/csgen.1.cmd #102296
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Runtime crashing on startup on emulated x64-on-ARM64 Windows #100425
    9.0.0
  • Dependency Injection: Required Properties #99692
  • [API Proposal]: DefaultMeterFactory should probably not be internal #94972
  • [wasm] Clang instruction selection crash for PackedSimd.Shuffle in AOT #85023
    8.0.0
  • [.NET 7.0 + WASM AOT] App crash after update #79152
    7.0.x
  • [.NET 7.0 + WASM AOT] Assembly.GetName().Name crashes the app #79814
    7.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: MultiplyAddEstimate #98053
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Failed to compile WinRT project #102259
    9.0.0
  • [ARM] Potential codegen issues on Graviton3 #100705
    9.0.0
  • UDP Socket.ReceiveFrom with receive timeout and SocketAddress shows inconsistent behavior between Windows and Linux #96237
    9.0.0
  • Kerberos impersonation level 'impersonation' instead of 'delegation'. #29587
    Future
  • NativeAOT: Invalid handling of `nosinglewarnassembly` #93819
    9.0.0
  • Empty loops are not eliminated #102328
  • [QUIC] Check inputs for `QuicConnection.CloseAsync` and `QuicStream.Abort` #101385
    9.0.0
  • [8.0][mono][interpreter] Native crash in System.Linq.Queryable.Tests #101831
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests crashing on linux-arm64 #102140
    9.0.0
  • [Long running test] System.Net.Tests.WebHeaderCollectionTest.HttpResponseHeader_AddInvalid_Throws #101919
  • Is it possible to implement a self-referential static abstract interface method in Reflection.Emit? #100537
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] SemaphoreSlimTests.RunSemaphoreSlimTest1_WaitAsync_NegativeCases deadlock #99501
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Some tests deadlock without -backgroundExec #99519
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Deadlock in TaskCoverage.Coverage.CancellationTokenRegitration #99500
    9.0.0
  • Infinite loop in Frame::UpdateFloatingPointRegisters on ARM64 #101921
    9.0.0
  • Runtime_86027 test fails in jitstress-random #102285
    9.0.0
  • System.Data.OleDb x64 support #102290
  • [API Proposal]: Add `WithIndex()` to Collections #102309
  • No way to create the "IAttributeSet" required by Android ExoPlayer constructor in .NET/C# #102300
  • Buffer not send using the Ping class #30829
  • Consider merging System.Net.Primitives and System.Net.Sockets #30833
  • jitstress-isas-x86 fails with Assertion failed 'IsBaselineSimdIsaSupportedDebugOnly()' #102284
    9.0.0
  • `StartupValidator` multiple registrations. #102061
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "[release/8.0-staging] Pin net7.0 to 7.0.19" #102353
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Fix "pPrecode->GetType() == PRECODE_FIXUP" assert #102352
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • Fix assert in Thread::VirtualUnwindCallFrame on ARM64 #102350
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #102346
    area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #102345
    area-codeflow
  • JIT: Enable RPO-based block layout by default #102343
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix DEREF_AFTER_NULL in /src/coreclr/jit/fgopt.cpp #102342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable sse2 test on full aot lane #102336
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Testing] Move tizen_armel to global-build.yml #102334
    linkable-framework
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.LastIndexOfAny #102331
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Disable fullAOT-llvm job on x64 due to OOM errors #102330
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix some assertions that fail when using `Lock` instances with `Monitor` #102327
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Improve code generating resolve stub assembly #102318
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't use write barriers for byref-like struct copies #102316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add saturating decrement/increment by element count #102315
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Enumerable.Index/Select((T, int)) iterator classes #102314
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Check for newlines in email address. #102311
    area-System.Net
  • Delete PAL definitions of MS-specific __int... types #102304
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Change Vector2/3/4, Quaternion, Plane, Vector<T>, and Vector64/128/256/512<T> to be implemented in managed where trivially possible #102301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • `CodeVersionManager` updates #102298
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 2 #102297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • In Windows host, use WriteConsoleW for stdout and stderr, and locale enabled print for file output #102295
    area-Host

Merged

  • Enable repackaging of NETStandard 2.1 Targeting Pack #102081
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #102208
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #102283
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Workaround broken special APC when running x64 on arm64 windows #102333
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Expose the FusedMultiplyAdd and MultiplyAddEstimate APIs on relevant vector and scalar types #102181
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Do not allow generic inlining of delegate creation #102299
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix leak during ssa transformation #102323
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Comments #102325
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Unpin arm build image, use Debian 12 helix images" #102324
    needs-area-label
  • make SocketAddress useable after receive timeout #102142
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • add support for Impersonation and Delegation to HttpWebRequest #102038
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Validate Close/Abort errorCode parameter #102264
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [NativeAOT] Do not emit safe point for TLS_GET_ADDR calls into native runtime. #102237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride validation error #101246
    area-System.Reflection
  • Move ML code to its own repo #102270
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] enable active issues #102212
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix Windows Arm64 unwinding #102258
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Canonicalize entry BB early #102280
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ROR(x, 32) on arm64 #102291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm] Suppress export name minification #102155
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Move unicodedata to minipal #102139
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Treat a couple more switches as output for make-repro-path #102287
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove IgnoreExitCode from lld version check #102278
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete some dead code in IL scanner #102289
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure that we don't hit an assert if DOTNET_EnableSSE2=0 #102288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rework ProbabilisticMap character checks in SearchValues #101001
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Ensure Single DI Registration For IStartupValidator #102235
    area-Extensions-Options, 9.0.0

Updated

  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates (Backport #99433) #102242
    area-Infrastructure
  • ILLink: Remove ScopeStack from MarkStep #102282
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • SVE: Added `LoadVectorx2`, `LoadVectorx3`, `LoadVectorx4` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • Add support for Sve.Store() #102262
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize Vector64.Create for constants #101662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add reasoning about loop trip counts and optimize counted loops into downwards counted loops #102261
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use OverloadResolutionPriority in a few places #102240
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Mark LoadFrom overload that always throws as obsolete #102292
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add `SetEntryAssembly()` API to `System.Reflection` #102271
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Connection Activities in SocketsHttpHandler #101814
    area-System.Net.Http
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • TypeDescriptor-related trimming supportType descriptor #102094
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix SortedSet.InternalIndexOf 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Update llvm-libunwind to v18 #102231
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use alternative mechanisms to allow us to use the default new/delete implementations #101947
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Add three-stage enqueuer/dispatcher scheme to SocketAsyncEngine, ThreadPoolWorkQueue and ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue #100506
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] added simple reverse pinvoke support to interpreter #102185
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • ilasm support for methods with multiple documents #102199
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Check for all expected warnings, then fail if any are unmatched #102286
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix cancellation unregistration in DataflowBlock.OutputAvailableAsync #99632
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 9.0.0
  • Console.ReadKey should not throw when read returns 0 records #98684
    area-System.Console
  • Make constructors private for parts of the ComInterfaceGenerator that should only be created from their static methods #101740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [wasm][workloads] Check downlevel runtime versions #102190
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift frozen struct lowering in mini-JIT/AOT/interpreter #102143
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V] Add pseudoinstructions to disassembler #102260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Separate hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #101543
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #102254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove reserved registers from parameter homing temp reg candidates #102168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Eliminate dead branches around typeof comparisons #102248
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete __if_exists #102277
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix context restoration as #101709 describes #101865
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix invalid operand register in the emitted addition/subtraction code #102074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
